name: Apple MacBook Pro 14"
description: Professional laptop powered by M3 Pro chip with 18GB unified memory. Features stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, up to 18 hours battery life, MagSafe charging, and studio-quality 6-speaker system.

reviews.review_text: The M3 Pro handles everything I throw at it. Compiling is a breeze.
Best laptop for software development. Period.
Expensive but worth it. Display is gorgeous for design work.
